post.description: To start the backup of the given modules.

get.description: This API fetches details of exports and provides the URL to download the bulk export ZIP file.

parameters.name: initiatedEndTime
parameters.description: The key that filters exports based on the end time of the duration in which the exports were initiated.

schema.description: The key that filters exports based on the end time of the duration in which the exports were initiated.

parameters.name: initiatedStartTime
parameters.description: The key that filters exports based on the start time of the duration in which the exports were initiated.

schema.description: The key that filters exports based on the start time of the duration in which the exports were initiated.

parameters.name: initiatedDuration
parameters.description: The key that filters exports within a specific duration. The allowed values are  @today@, @yesterday@, @currentWeek@, @currentMonth@, @last3days@, @last7days@, @last15days@, @last30days@, @last3months@, @CUSTOM_IN_DATE@.

schema.description: The key that filters exports within a specific duration. The allowed values are  @today@, @yesterday@, @currentWeek@, @currentMonth@, @last3days@, @last7days@, @last15days@, @last30days@, @last3months@, @CUSTOM_IN_DATE@.

parameters.name: initiatorIds
parameters.description: The key that filters exports based on the users who initiated the exports. The default value includes all initiators.

schema.description: The key that filters exports based on the users who initiated the exports. The default value includes all initiators.

x-custom-parameters-attributes: The key that filters exports based on the users who initiated the exports. The default value includes all initiators.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
The key that sorts exports by _initiatedTime_.
If the value of sortBy key is:
* @initiatedTime@ - Sort in ascending order
* @-initiatedTime@ - Sort in descending order (prefixed with '-')

_Note_: By default, sorting is done in descending order based on initiatedTime.

schema.description:
The key that sorts exports by _initiatedTime_.
If the value of sortBy key is:
* @initiatedTime@ - Sort in ascending order
* @-initiatedTime@ - Sort in descending order (prefixed with '-')

_Note_: By default, sorting is done in descending order based on initiatedTime.

parameters.name: departmentIds
parameters.description: The key that filters exports based on specific departments. The default value includes all departments.

schema.description: The key that filters exports based on specific departments. The default value includes all departments.

x-custom-parameters-attributes: The key that filters exports based on specific departments. The default value includes all departments.

parameters.name: modules
parameters.description: The key that filters exports based on specific modules. The default value includes all modules.

schema.description: The key that filters exports based on specific modules. The default value includes all modules.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The key that filters exports based on their statuses. The allowed values are @INITIATED@, @INPROGRESS@, @COMPLETED@, @FAILED@. The default value includes all statuses

schema.description: The key that filters exports based on their statuses. The allowed values are @INITIATED@, @INPROGRESS@, @COMPLETED@, @FAILED@. The default value includes all statuses

get.description: To download the exported data as a ZIP file

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Specifies the timestamp after which data modifications are included in the backup.
Specifies the timestamp until which data modifications are included in the backup.
Specifies the type of backup. The allowed values are @INCREMENTAL@ and @FULL@
The maximum number of rows per file.
Specifies the timestamp after which data modifications are included in the backup.
Specifies the timestamp until which data modifications are included in the backup.
Specifies the type of backup. The allowed values are @INCREMENTAL@ and @FULL@
The maximum number of rows per file.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Number of record limit to fetch

schema.description: Number of record limit to fetch

exportId.name: exportId
exportId.description: the id of the export which was initiated for first time

schema.description: the id of the export which was initiated for first time
